name: Fred Again
description: '''Frederick John Philip Gibson''' (born 19 July 1993), known professionally as '''Fred Again''' (stylised as '''Fred again..''') or simply '''Fred''' (stylised as '''FRED'''), is an English record producer, singer, songwriter, multi-instrumentalist and DJ.  At the [[66th Annual Grammy Awards]], he was nominated for [[Best New Artist]], won [[Best Dance/Electronic Album]] for his third album ''[[Actual Life 3 (January 1 â€“ September 9 2022)]]'' (2022), and won [[Grammy Award for Best Dance/Electronic Recording|Best Dance/Electronic Recording]] for his 2023 single "[[Rumble (Skrillex, Fred Again and Flowdan song)|Rumble]]" (with [[Skrillex]] and [[Flowdan]]).
